mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice(company_id, notice_title, is_closed, salary, degree, career, notice_content, created_At) VALUE(#{companyId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{isClosed}, #{salary}, #{degree}, #{career}, #{noticeContent}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id FROM Notice WHERE company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY created_At desc FETCH NEXT 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT cn.notice_id, cn.notice_title, cn.resume_title, c.address, c.company_name, c.company_id FROM (SELECT n.notice_Id, n.notice_title, n.company_Id ,ML.resume_title FROM (SELECT s.*, pp.resume_title, pp.person_id FROM(SELECT r.person_id, r.resume_title, r.resume_id FROM person p INNER JOIN resume r ON p.person_id = r.person_id WHERE user_id=1) pp INNER JOIN submit_resume s ON s.resume_Id = pp.resume_Id) ML INNER JOIN notice n ON ML.notice_Id = n.notice_Id WHERE n.is_closed=0) cn INNER JOIN company c ON cn.company_id = c.company_id
